mapper.sql: ID, CULPRIT_ID, PATH, PATH_NAME, WRIT_NUM_Z, WRIT_NUM_T, DIC_S_THREE_NON_KEY, DIC_IS_TRAIN_KEY, DIC_SKILLS_CERTIFICATE_KEY, DIC_REDRESS_SHOW_KEY, DIC_PLEA_ATTITUDE_KEY, ADDRESS, RISK_ID, FAMILY_CONTACT_ID, SKILL_INFO, IS_AGREE, NOTE_PATH, NOTE_PATH_NAME, END_REASON_ID, END_DETAIL_REASON, END_PATH, END_PATH_NAME, END_ACCOUNT_NAME, END_ACCOUNT_ID, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG, PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID,REMARK, (select g.name from SYS_GROUP g left join SF_CULPRIT c on g.id=c.GROUP_ID where c.id=CULPRIT_ID) groupName, (select c.name from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=CULPRIT_ID) culpritName

mapper.update:
update SF_FINISH_REDRESS
CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATH_NAME = #{pathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_NUM_Z = #{writNumZ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_NUM_T = #{writNumT,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_S_THREE_NON_KEY = #{dicSThreeNonKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_IS_TRAIN_KEY = #{dicIsTrainKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_SKILLS_CERTIFICATE_KEY = #{dicSkillsCertificateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_REDRESS_SHOW_KEY = #{dicRedressShowKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_PLEA_ATTITUDE_KEY = #{dicPleaAttitudeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RISK_ID = #{riskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAMILY_CONTACT_ID = #{familyContactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKILL_INFO = #{skillInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_AGREE = #{isAgree,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NOTE_PATH = #{notePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE_PATH_NAME = #{notePathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_REASON_ID = #{endReasonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_DETAIL_REASON = #{endDetailReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_PATH = #{endPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_PATH_NAME = #{endPathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_ACCOUNT_NAME = #{endAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_ACCOUNT_ID = #{endAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HELP_VIEW = #{helpView,jdbcType=CLOB},
REMARK=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_FINISH_REDRESS set CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATH_NAME = #{pathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_NUM_Z = #{writNumZ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_NUM_T = #{writNumT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_S_THREE_NON_KEY = #{dicSThreeNonKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_IS_TRAIN_KEY = #{dicIsTrainKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_SKILLS_CERTIFICATE_KEY = #{dicSkillsCertificateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_REDRESS_SHOW_KEY = #{dicRedressShowKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_PLEA_ATTITUDE_KEY = #{dicPleaAttitudeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RISK_ID = #{riskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAMILY_CONTACT_ID = #{familyContactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKILL_INFO = #{skillInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_AGREE = #{isAgree,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NOTE_PATH = #{notePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE_PATH_NAME = #{notePathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_REASON_ID = #{endReasonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_DETAIL_REASON = #{endDetailReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_PATH = #{endPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_PATH_NAME = #{endPathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_ACCOUNT_NAME = #{endAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_ACCOUNT_ID = #{endAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HELP_VIEW = #{helpView,jdbcType=CLOB}, REMARK=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_FINISH_REDRESS set CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATH_NAME = #{pathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_NUM_Z = #{writNumZ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_NUM_T = #{writNumT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_S_THREE_NON_KEY = #{dicSThreeNonKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_IS_TRAIN_KEY = #{dicIsTrainKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_SKILLS_CERTIFICATE_KEY = #{dicSkillsCertificateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_REDRESS_SHOW_KEY = #{dicRedressShowKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_PLEA_ATTITUDE_KEY = #{dicPleaAttitudeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RISK_ID = #{riskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAMILY_CONTACT_ID = #{familyContactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKILL_INFO = #{skillInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_AGREE = #{isAgree,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NOTE_PATH = #{notePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE_PATH_NAME = #{notePathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_REASON_ID = #{endReasonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_DETAIL_REASON = #{endDetailReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_PATH = #{endPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_PATH_NAME = #{endPathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_ACCOUNT_NAME = #{endAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_ACCOUNT_ID = #{endAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: AND exists (select * from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=t.CULPRIT_ID and c.name like '%'||#{culpritName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')
AND exists (select * from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=t.CULPRIT_ID and c.GROUP_ID=#{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g left join SF_CULPRIT c on g.id=c.group_id where c.id=CULPRIT_ID)
